alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Potter; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 11:14PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CENTRE...POTTER AND CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong showers and thunderstorms extending from near Wellsville to 13 miles north of Bellefonte. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Keating, Coudersport, Lamar, Mill Hall, Dunnstown, Flemington, Renovo, Castanea, Galeton, Milesburg, Genesee, Blanchard, South Renovo, Monument, Cross Fork, Glen Union, Harrison Valley, Bald Eagle State Park and Denton Hill State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Potter; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton
